an4.187:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
an4.187:1.2: Atha kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an4.187:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.187:2.1: “Janeyya nu kho, bho gotama, asappuriso asappurisam:
an4.187:2.3: “Atthanam kho etam, brahmana, anavakaso yam asappuriso asappurisam janeyya:
an4.187:2.7: “Etampi kho, brahmana, atthanam anavakaso yam asappuriso sappurisam janeyya:
an4.187:2.9: “Janeyya nu kho, bho gotama, sappuriso sappurisam:
an4.187:2.11: “Thanam kho etam, brahmana, vijjati yam sappuriso sappurisam janeyya:
an4.187:2.15: “Etampi kho, brahmana, thanam vijjati yam sappuriso asappurisam janeyya:
an4.187:3.3: ‘atthanam kho etam, brahmana, anavakaso yam asappuriso asappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:3.5: Etampi kho, brahmana, atthanam anavakaso yam asappuriso sappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:3.7: Thanam kho etam, brahmana, vijjati yam sappuriso sappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:3.9: Etampi kho, brahmana, thanam vijjati yam sappuriso asappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:4.1: Ekamidam, bho gotama, samayam todeyyassa brahmanassa parisati paruparambham vattenti:
an4.187:4.2: ‘balo ayam raja eleyyo samane ramaputte abhippasanno, samane ca pana ramaputte evarupam paramanipaccakaram karoti, yadidam abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikammanti.
an4.187:4.4: yamako moggallo uggo navindaki gandhabbo aggivesso, ye samane ramaputte abhippasanna, samane ca pana ramaputte evarupam paramanipaccakaram karonti, yadidam abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikamman’ti.
an4.187:4.5: Tyassudam todeyyo brahmano imina nayena neti.
an4.187:4.7: pandito raja eleyyo karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro’ti?
an4.187:4.8: ‘Evam, bho, pandito raja eleyyo karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataroti.
an4.187:5.1: Yasma ca kho, bho, samano ramaputto ranna eleyyena panditena panditataro karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarena alamatthadasataro, tasma raja eleyyo samane ramaputte abhippasanno, samane ca pana ramaputte evarupam paramanipaccakaram karoti, yadidam abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikammam’.
an4.187:6.3: yamako moggallo uggo navindaki gandhabbo aggivesso, karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasatara’ti?
an4.187:6.5: yamako moggallo uggo navindaki gandhabbo aggivesso, karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasatarati.
an4.187:7.1: Yasma ca kho, bho, samano ramaputto ranno eleyyassa pariharakehi panditehi panditataro karaniyadhikaraniyesu vacaniyadhivacaniyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro, tasma ranno eleyyassa pariharaka samane ramaputte abhippasanna;
an4.187:7.2: samane ca pana ramaputte evarupam paramanipaccakaram karonti, yadidam abhivadanam paccutthanam anjalikammam samicikamman’ti.
an4.187:8.1: Acchariyam, bho gotama, abbhutam, bho gotama.
an4.187:8.3: ‘atthanam kho etam, brahmana, anavakaso yam asappuriso asappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:8.5: Etampi kho, brahmana, atthanam anavakaso yam asappuriso sappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:8.7: Thanam kho etam, brahmana, vijjati yam sappuriso sappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:8.9: Etampi kho, brahmana, thanam vijjati yam sappuriso asappurisam janeyya—
an4.187:8.11: Handa ca dani mayam, bho gotama, gacchama.
an4.187:9.1: Atha kho vassakaro brahmano magadhamahamatto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana pakkamiti.
